﻿ <h>DENMUSO FILA</h> ayiwa, an bè na ko wèrè fana daminè ka o fò aw ye.﻿ <h> DENMUSOdén.musonfilledénnenfantmùsoadjfemme FILAfìlanumdeux </h> ayiwaáyiwaintjbon , anánpers1PL bèbɛ́pmIPFV.AFF nanàvvenir kokónaffaire wèrèwɛ́rɛadjautre fanafánaprtaussi daminèdá.mìnɛvcommencerdánbouchemìnɛvattraper kakàpmINF oòprnce fòfɔ́vdire awáwpers2PL.EMPH yeyéppPP . dennin dò don.dennindén.ninnfillettedénnenfantninmrphDIM dòdɔ́dtmcertain dondòncopPRES . a fa sara, a ba sara ka a tò to a ba sinamuso ye.aàpers3SG fafànpère sarasaravsàvmourirramrphPFV.INTR , aàpers3SG babánmère sarasaravsàvmourirramrphPFV.INTR kakàpmINF aàpers3SG tòtɔ̀nle.reste totóvrester aàpers3SG babánmère sinamusosìna.musoncoépousesìnancoépousemùsonfemme yeyéppPP . a ba sinamuso o juguyara a la kosèbè.aàpers3SG babánmère sinamusosìna.musoncoépousesìnancoépousemùsonfemme oòprnce juguyarajuguyaravjúgu.yavaggraverjúguvq/adjmauvaisyamrphDEQUramrphPFV.INTR aàpers3SG laláppdans kosèbèkó.sɛbɛadvtrès.bienkónaffairesɛ̀bɛadj/nsérieux . lon kelen kèra, a denw ye dumunni kè.londónnjour kelenkélennumun kèrakɛravkɛ́vfaireramrphPFV.INTR , aàpers3SG denwdenwndénnenfantwmrphPL yeyépmPFV.TR dumunnidúmuninaction.de.manger kèkɛ́vfaire . ni u banna tuma min, o dennin, o bè na ka na ka dumunni kè.niníconjsi uùpers3PL yenyènadv/nlà-bas . sani i bè taga yen, suruku bè sila rò, warakalan bè sila rò, jinajugu bè sila rò , gòòtèw bè sila rò.sanisá.niconjavant.desániciníconj/prepet iípers2.SG minmínprnREL , nńpersje yeyépmPFV.TR oòprnce bilabìlavmettre yenyènadv/nlà-bas .

﻿ <h>DÒGÒNIN ANI KÒRÒKÈ</h> n ye a da nin cè nin fila ye, kòrò ni dògò dò tun don.﻿ <h> DÒGÒNINdɔ́gɔ.ninncadetdɔ́gɔncadetninmrphDIM ANIàniconjainsi.que ﻿ <h>CÈNIN KEGUNMAN</h> nsiirinin, nsiirinin ko muso kònòma dò tun tagara lògònyiniyòrò.﻿ <h> CÈNINcɛ̀.ninnjeune.hommecɛ̀nmâleninmrphDIM KEGUNMANkègun.manadjmalinkègunvqmalinmanmrphADJ </h> nsiirininnsíirin.ninnnsíirinnconteninmrphDIM , nsiirininnsíirin.ninnnsíirinnconteninmrphDIM kokócopQUOT musomùsonfemme kònòmakɔ́nɔ.maadjenceintekɔ́nɔnventremamrphCOM dòdɔ́dtmcertain ﻿ <h>AMADU TARA</h> n ye n ka nsiirin nin da Amadu Tara la.﻿ <h> AMADUÁmadùn.propNOM.M TARATARAn.propNOM.CL </h> nńpersje yeyépmPFV.TR nńpersje kakáconjPOSS nsiirinnsíirinnconte ninnìnprn/dtmDEM dadávposer AmaduÁmadùn.propNOM.M TaraTaran.propNOM.CL laláppdans . jamanatigi dò tun bè yen, muso kònòntò de tun bè a fè.jamanatigijàmana.tiginprésidentjàmananpaystìginmaître dòdɔ́dtmcertain tuntùnprtPST bèbɛ́copBE yenyènadv/nlà-bas , musomùsonfemme kònòntòkɔ̀nɔntɔnnumneuf dedèprtFOC tuntùnprtPST bèbɛ́copBE aàpers3SG fèfɛ̀ppvers . muso kònòntò bèè ye denkè kelen kelen wolo a ye.musomùsonfemme kònòntòkɔ̀nɔntɔnnumneuf bèèbɛ́ɛdtmtout yeyépmPFV.TR denkèdén.kɛnfilsdénnenfantkɛadjmâle kelenkélennumun kelenkélennumun wolowólovaccoucher aàpers3SG yeyéppPP . a denkè kelen kelen bèè fana tògò ye ko Amadu.aàpers3SG denkèdén.kɛnfilsdénnenfantkɛadjmâle kelenkélennumun kelenkélennumun bèèbɛ́ɛdtmtout fanafánaprtaussi tògòtɔ́gɔnnom yeyécopEQU kokócopQUOT AmaduÁmadùn.propNOM.M . ﻿ <h>ALA ANI SONSANNIN</h> ayiwa, ntalen.﻿ <h> ALAÁlanDieu ANIàniconjainsi.que SONSANNINsonsanninnsònsannlièvreninmrphDIM </h> ayiwaáyiwaintjbon , ntalenntàlennparabole . n ye a da nin de la.nńpersje yeyépmPFV.TR aàpers3SG dadávposer ninnìnprn/dtmDEM dedèprtFOC laláppdans . sonsannin ani wòlò u tagara a fò Mangala ye ko Mangala ka kengunya di u ma.sonsanninsonsanninnsònsannlièvreninmrphDIM aniàniconjainsi.que wòlòwɔ̀lɔnfrancolin uùpers3PL tagaratagaravtágavallerramrphPFV.INTR aàpers3SG fòfɔ́vdire Mangalamá.ŋalanDieumánDieuŋálanDieu yeyéppPP kokócopQUOT Mangalamá.ŋalanDieumánDieuŋálanDieu kakàpmINF kengunyakègun.yanrusekègunvqmalinyamrphDEQU didívdonner uùpers3PL mamàppà .
